titles.title: A bill for the relief of Elizabeth M. Hill.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 3/31/1988--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a certain sum to a named individual in satisfaction of a claim against a tortiously liable third party for the value of medical care furnished by the United States to that individual.
